concise_definition: v. 伸展, 拉伸, 延伸; n. 伸展, 一段, 距离

definitions.explanation_en: To extend or pull something to make it longer or wider, often by applying force; can refer to physical movement or expansion of materials.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指通过施加力量使某物（如身体、绳索、布料）变长或变宽，常用于描述身体的伸展或材料的拉伸。
definitions.example_en: She stretched her arms above her head after waking up.
definitions.example_cn: 她醒来后将双臂举过头顶伸展了一下。

definitions.explanation_en: To extend the limits of something, such as time, resources, or ability, often to the point of strain or beyond normal capacity.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指将时间、资源或能力等推至极限，甚至超出正常范围，常带有勉强或吃力的意味。
definitions.example_en: The budget was stretched to cover all the necessary expenses.
definitions.example_cn: 预算被勉强用来支付所有必要开支。

definitions.explanation_en: To exaggerate or distort the truth, often to make a story more impressive or to gain an advantage.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指夸大或歪曲事实，通常是为了让故事听起来更引人注目或获取某种优势。
definitions.example_en: He stretched the facts to make his experience sound more impressive.
definitions.example_cn: 他夸大了事实，使自己的经历听起来更了不起。

definitions.explanation_en: A continuous length or area of something, such as a road, river, or period of time.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指某物（如道路、河流或时间段）的一段连续长度或区域。
definitions.example_en: We drove for miles along a quiet stretch of highway.
definitions.example_cn: 我们沿着一段宁静的高速公路开了好几英里。

definitions.explanation_en: An act of stretching the body or a part of it, especially to relieve tension or improve flexibility.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指身体或身体某部分的伸展动作，尤指为缓解紧张或提高柔韧性而进行的伸展。
definitions.example_en: Yoga includes many stretches to improve mobility and reduce stress.
definitions.example_cn: 瑜伽包含许多伸展动作，以提高活动能力并减轻压力。

comparison.analysis: “Extend” (延伸) 更强调在原有基础上向外延长或扩大范围，常用于时间、空间或服务的扩展，语气中性，不带拉伸的物理张力。而 “stretch” 更强调通过外力拉长或压紧，常伴随紧张感或极限状态，如拉伸肌肉或夸大事实。
“Expand” (扩张) 指体积、规模或范围的扩大，通常是均匀或全方位的，如气球膨胀、公司扩张。而 “stretch” 更侧重于单向的拉长或拉伸，常有变形或紧绷的含义，如拉伸橡皮筋或勉强应付预算。
“Strain” (拉紧/竭力) 强调因过度用力而导致的压力或损伤，常为负面结果。而 “stretch” 可以是中性或积极的（如运动伸展），只有在过度时才接近 “strain” 的含义。例如：stretch a muscle（拉伸肌肉）是正常行为，但 strain a muscle（拉伤肌肉）则是受伤。
